conbody.p: There are two types of licenses: KSE per-User and KRE floating. You can purchase KSE per-User licenses and KRE floating licenses depending on your work requirements.
For detailed information on KS (free), see Trial and Free Plans.
For detailed information on KSE per-User license, see: Katalon Studio Enterprise per-User license.
For detailed information on KRE floating license, see: Katalon Runtime Engine floating license.
Common rules of KSE per-User and KRE floating licenses:

row.entry: KSE per-User and KRE floating licenses
Monthly or annual. To learn how to change the billing plan, see Upgrade Billing Plan.
You can purchase online licenses. To learn more, see: Purchase Katalon Licenses

As an organization member, you can only activate and use licenses. License management is done by the Admin/Owner of the Organization. To learn more about license management, see Manage Katalon Licenses.
You can transfer a license from one user to another. For more information on how to transfer licenses, refer to Transfer a license.
You will be logged out of the current machine if you use the same license on another machine at the same time.
You can use a license to perform multiple execution sessions on one machine at a time with the parallel mode of test suite collections.
